成人劑量:
Clostridioides difficile infection, treatment:
Initial or recurrent, nonfulminant infection: Oral: 125 mg Q6H for 10 days.
Fulminant infection: Oral: 500 mg Q6H for 10 days.
小孩劑量:
C. difficile infection; treatment:
Infants, Children, and Adolescents: Oral: 40 mg/kg/day Q6-8H for 7-10 days; maximum daily dose: 2,000 mg/day.
副作用: 紅斑、發冷或發熱、噁心、蕁麻疹
用藥指導: 用於管灌病人時，請直接敲碎膠囊後再溶於至少10 mL飲用水後於1小時內服用。
